A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a fetid turd of a movie. You're going to make the central character of this whole franchise go against his character\, decades of close personal loyalties and everything he's built his life on for a dream he has one night?!? What a hack script. Shame on all of you for taking something wonderful and turning it to crap. Couldn't even be bothered to give him a meaningful ending. He disappears?!? Give me a break. Rian Johnson if I ever run into you at a restaurant I swear to God I'm going to punch you in the face as hard as I can\, and I carry brass knuckles.
